comments.author: HetGewildeWesten
comments.body: The music dome of the [Oosterpark](https://maps.app.goo.gl/gtezH7nMtsx1upLt7), Amsterdam.  2021-10-27 in the afternoon.

comments.author: 96HourDeo
comments.body: Reminder to anyone planning something like this is that you must have a permit for an event with amplified music in the dome.

comments.author: Synsane
comments.body:
Does anyone know what all the construction from last year on that "music dome" did last year? 
 
I went up there after it was reopened, and it was still old and dirty and ground chipped up

comments.author: Unaccompaniedbyminor
comments.body: Curious about the music: is this Nepali?

comments.author: JosZo
comments.body:
In 2025, tango milongas will be restarting again in this music dome. On Sunday afternoons.

https://www.tangoalma.nl/tangosalons/oosterpark/

comments.author: Prouddadoffour73
comments.body: Ik snap nu waarom dansen in China lange tijd verboden is geweest.

comments.author: we-do-rae
comments.body: Just an honest question: why do you post this dance from 3 years ago?

comments.author: Expensive-Fee-7391
comments.body:
Do you need a permit for the 24/7 drug market tho? Don't see anyone closing that one down.

I'd assume some music and dancing is fine.

comments.author: dullestfranchise
comments.body: Repairing the roof. It wasn't stable anymore and they feared it could collapse.

comments.author: HetGewildeWesten
comments.body: We post a lot of old and new material of what people do and what there is to see in Amsterdam.

comments.author: 96HourDeo
comments.body:
> I'd assume some music and dancing is fine.

Any use of amplified music in the dome requires a permit. The group in the video almost certainly has one. Otherwise the gemente issues a fine. This is a civic matter.

This has nothing to do with drug crime, which is a police matter.

comments.author: Synsane
comments.body: I see. It is unfortunate that they just stopped there, but I guess something is better than nothing. Even though the construction workers definitely caused some of the ground damage while working on the roof
